casebody.data:
The PEOPLE, etc., Respondent,
v.
Jude FRANCIS, Appellant. Motion No: 2017-1192 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 12, 2017

Motion by Youth Represent et al. for leave to appear amici curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
